Posts.EditableText: hi all this game is now in mystery. Thanks to whomever put it in there. http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/960/ Hi all I've released DARK MIRRORS today it's a supernatural mystery. I hope you all enjoy it please let me know if there are any bugs and I will sort them out. It's best downloaded. 5.3 does not like this game or maybe the other way round who knows. I'd like to thank The Pixie and Jaynabonne for their time in beta testing it for me. So please enjoy Terry
Posts.HTML:
hi all this game is now in mystery. Thanks to whomever put it in there.
http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/960/

Hi all I've released DARK MIRRORS today it's a supernatural mystery. I hope you all enjoy it please let me know if there are any bugs and I will sort them out. It's best downloaded. 5.3 does not like this game or maybe the other way round who knows. I'd like to thank The Pixie and Jaynabonne for their time in beta testing it for me. So please enjoy Terry
